_sText:
I found this map quite a while ago and decided to make it run in CS:S
So I did this thing off it.

Orginal map is gpk_dropoff from rtheone.

After a few peoples here got fucked up I asked him if I can let it up here and got his permission.

So to everyone who says I've stolen it may be right but now I got permission to use it and you should not fuck up about it.


It is very good for playing Warcraft:Source or RPGmod
but not so good for normal public because you need to change some settings in rder to run it proberly.

Have Fun & Play Fair


Come and visit us on our Servers:
